pages.title: Introduction
pages.summary:
# Introduction to BlackSlope.NET

## Overview
Introduce the BlackSlope.NET reference architecture as a modern .NET 6.0 enterprise application developed by Slalom Build, covering its purpose as a reference implementation for building RESTful APIs.

## Key Features
- RESTful API architecture
- Azure AD authentication support
- Entity Framework Core with SQL Server
- Docker containerization
- Comprehensive middleware pipeline
- Automated testing infrastructure

## Architecture Philosophy
- Clean architecture principles
- Separation of concerns
- Dependency injection
- SOLID principles
